dialogue.speaker: Marty
dialogue.line: Hey Sally! I am Marty, who the peck is this?!

dialogue.speaker: Sally & Emmett
dialogue.line: Hi Morty, this is Emmett. He is my Partner for life. |And we saw your picture, so we could not resist to try something new.

dialogue.speaker: Marty
dialogue.line: What do you think I am? I am not in to those kind of stuff.

dialogue.speaker: Sally & Emmett
dialogue.line: |Well as you are such a little party fruit we figured you|would be more open minded. Seems like we have missed the mark|on this one Honey.

dialogue.speaker: Marty
dialogue.line: I am off, but you two Lovebirds should stop with this false |Advertising on Timber!

dialogue.speaker: Sally & Emmett
dialogue.line: Like you have anything to say anything on this Matter! Adieu.
